page.title: 09AMPNEY ST MARY AND CRUCIS
page.content: {Ampney Crucis & Ampney St.Mary}are now part of a group of parishes including{ {Ampney St.Peter, Harnhill, Driffield & {Poulton.}The vicar,Rev.Peter Jeffries, is responsible for all those parishes. Services are held at{Ampney Crucis} almost every Sunday, but at{Ampney St. {Mary,}known as "the Ivy Church", less often. At{Ampney Crucis}the congregation is small but regular apart from Harvest Festival, Easter, Remembrance Sunday and Christmas time when the church is full. The Methodist Chapel, a corrugated iron building, is up for sale because most of its members have died. Methodists now go to{Cirencester}and so do most Roman Catholics. Most people do not go to church regularly.
